name: Fireflies (itch) (Thobi)
description:
FIREFLIES was made during a "school jam" where concept artists, 3d artists and game designers all worked together.

The theme were "Day and Night"

You embody a female firefly the day and you need to place crystals in order to help the male firefly you will play the day to find the female "nest"

Members of the Project :

- AUBOIRON Valentin

- SORRENTI Lucas
